abstracts.cdata!:
This is a statement by Eugene Miagkov at
            the Board meeting of March 30, 1999 concerning the Country
            Assistance Strategy, the Social Sector Support Project, the
            Education Sector Support Project, and the Year 2000
            Technical Assistance Project for Malaysia.
